title: PES CSE AIML vs MIT (BLR) CSE
content: Everybody says PES is better but I don't deal with stress well. I'm not sure what to choose pls help

comments.body: Take pes. Here the branch is new, there the entire college is new
Dude if it was MIT(Manipal) it would be a no brainer to go to Manipal. Here, if it's PES (RR or EC) you'll be better off than taking Manipal (BLR).
no chance buddy, he is comparing with the bangalore one not main

Are you serious?
He said he doesn't handle stress well - we all know how awful the admin is here
Makes zero sense to let him get stuck here let him go and live his live in mit bnglr at least. Placement will happen when the person remains alive at the end of four yrs anyway
you got me there, i agree 's' in pes stands for stress
Tbh if you cant handle stress easily are you sure you wanna become an engineer? Would suggest try and get outta your comfort zone
pes cs core vs mit manipal cse?
Comes down to personal preference. I would take Manipal cos it's more like a college than a school. But again it is the more expensive option if you don't stay near college.
